channel.title: No shield when wielding a 2h wep
channel.description: I'm using hiyaspace and i need help with this problem. eg. you wield your 2h wep first and then you can weild shield, i dont want this to happen

item.title: No shield when wielding a 2h wep
item.dc:creator: @d10n d10n
item.description:
@d10n wrote:

[quote=“Olzax, post:5, topic:226900”][quote author=skiller noob1 link=topic=298173.msg2395464#msg2395464 date=1219142179]
You failed, I would love to get a penny everytime someone says “I would rep if Icould” I would be a rich some bitch
[/quote]
i need 15+ rep to rep people so i said i would becuase i can’t, so stop trying to be a smartass[/quote]
he’s not being a smartass. and yes, alot of people say “but i can’t” So. i guess hes right.

Read full topic

item.title: No shield when wielding a 2h wep
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

[quote=“modbrian, post:2, topic:226900”]search for
public static int more2handed[] = {
and when you find it just add the item IDs after it like

public static int more2handed[] = { 15333, 15334};[/quote]
thanks, i would rep you if i could

Read full topic
